name: Mutant Dystopia
description:
Sometime in the near future, a massive global mutation occurred, creating creatures of unimaginable horror. Stingers of scorpions and the size of elephants, the only way to fight them is by controlling their nervous system directly by either triggering submission or aggression… Protect yourself and your Home Base. This won’t be an easy mission.

This game was made the the GM(48)   48 hour game jam.

Special Features:
Online highscores
Top 10 global leaderboard
Two weapons
Health packs
